5.13.21  9:39 pm   why can't i talk to people normally? i used to be able to, then some bad things happened, and I think I now see myself as someone who just can't communicate with the average person in an honest and fulfilling way. I just want to be free and happy and truly loving people the way I do. What's the key to opening this locked chamber within myself?
5.13.21  7:52 pm   Do you usually write chord progressions based on their key (C, D, E) or their relation to the tonic (I, ii, iii)?

5.13.21  7:48 pm   so I tried writing a piece that started in C Dorian, and it sounds okay, but as I was looking at it today, I realized I flatted the sixth instead of the third. the resulting scale was this: C D E F G Ab Bb C. it's not Dorian, so what would you call it?
5.13.21  5:23 pm   how do i stop feeling guilty about quitting things i don't like?

5.13.21  4:36 pm   I've been listening to your older work recently, and they're all so damn good man. I don't think there's a single song I dislike from you, you are easily one of my favorite musicians.

     How long did it take you to get your voice to something you're comfortable singing with,

      how did you train it (if you did)

     and how many tries on average does it take to sing your songs?

      Thank you, keep up the amazing work man.

5.12.21  4:15 pm   When I'm in the middle of completing a hard portion of a goal, I often have a strong urge in the middle of hardship or annoyance to run away from the task and do something pleasant. It hits repeatedly, and accompanies a virtual titanium wall that starts to prevent me from moving forward and even if I can stand to get past it I work very slowly. If I cant stand it, I abandon the process. How can I better deal with or eliminate this pernicious feeling?

5.12.21  10:17 am   alright, after some intense thought i think i've come up with a way to balance both my creative work and Fun Stuff outside of work, here's my revised weekly schedule:
monday: work
tuesday: work
wednesday: work
thursday: work
friday: WHATEVER THE HELL
saturday: work
sunday: work
is this a fair and balanced schedule or would you recommend i mix it up every once in a while? thanks,
